content:
SGA director of Student Services Will Carver and former SGA Sen PERIOD Henrique

Vissotto may be paired up in the next SGA elections to run for

president PERIOD

Vissotto already stands by the decision he will run in the SGA elections in

the spring as a candidate for the presidency PERIOD

 Vissotto said PERIOD 

However Carver said he has not made a final decision on whether or not he

will run in the next elections yet PERIOD

 Carver said PERIOD

Some within SGA claim Carver is the likely choice to run against Vissotto PERIOD

SGA Reese Hall Sen PERIOD Brian Benda said because Carver has been highlighted by

SGA this semester he is the obvious candidate PERIOD

 Benda said PERIOD 

SGA President Boyd Richards said he does not know if Carver will compete

for the SGA presidential seat or not but maintains the election will be an

interesting one PERIOD

Vissotto said part of the reason he decided to run was a result of the

disagreements he had with SGA earlier this semester and according to him

the student governments lack of concern for the students PERIOD

 Vissotto

said PERIOD

Vissotto said he has not decided on a running mate yet for the SGA vice

presidential slot but currently has three or four people in mind for

consideration PERIOD

Carver said the position for SGA president is open to anyone and encourages

all those who are interested to apply for candidacy PERIOD

 Carver said PERIOD

 Richards said PERIOD
